postCreateCommand.mongo: podman pull docker.io/library/mongo:4.4-focal;  podman run --name mongo -d mongo:4.4-focal;
postCreateCommand.redis: podman pull docker.io/library/redis:latest; podman run --name redis -d redis:latest;

postStartCommand.sql-server: podman stop sql-server; podman start sql-server
postStartCommand.mongo: podman stop mongo; podman start mongo
postStartCommand.redis: podman stop redis; podman start redis
